## TileDataSourceOptions interface

Set of common options for all \[\[TileDataSource\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TileDataSourceOptions extends DataSourceOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [concurrentDecoderScriptUrl](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.concurrentdecoderscripturl.md) | string | Optional URL for decoder bundle to be loaded into web worker. |
|  [concurrentDecoderServiceName](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.concurrentdecoderservicename.md) | string | Optional name of decoder service class.  \[\[ConcurrentDecoderFacade\]\]  \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\] |
|  [concurrentDecoderWorkerCount](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.concurrentdecoderworkercount.md) | number | Optional count of web workers to use with the decoder bundle. |
|  [copyrightInfo](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.copyrightinfo.md) | [CopyrightInfo](./harp-mapview.copyrightinfo.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Optional, default copyright information of tiles provided by this data source. Implementation should provide this information from the source data if possible. |
|  [copyrightProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.copyrightprovider.md) | [CopyrightProvider](./harp-mapview.copyrightprovider.md) | Optional copyright info provider for tiles provided by this data source. Copyrights from provider are concatenated with default ones from <code>copyrightInfo</code>. |
|  [dataProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.dataprovider.md) | [DataProvider](./harp-mapview-decoder.dataprovider.md) | The \[\[DataProvider\]\] to use for downloading the actual data. |
|  [decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.decoder.md) | [ITileDecoder](./harp-datasource-protocol.itiledecoder.md) | Optional: Specify \[\[ITileDecoder\]\] instance. |
|  [tilingScheme](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasourceoptions.tilingscheme.md) | [TilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.md) | The \[\[TilingScheme\]\] the data source is using. |
